name: AnimalPlanet
description: Animal planet is a simulation game which takes puzzle as the core mechanism. Players need to place various hexagonal blocks on the planet to create a balanced ecosystem. In the game, players can place different blocks on the planet, and blocks will directly generate different animals according to the surrounding blocks. Player needs to neither letting some animals to die out, nor allowing them to consume forests into deserts. Success is earned when enough variety of the ecosystem is obtained.
